verses.verse: And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> in his <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> was with him, and <S%H1431>magnified<s%> him <S%H4605>exceedingly.<s%>

Then <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> and of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> and to the <S%H8199>judges,<s%> and to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5387>governor<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

So <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> with him, <S%H3212>went<s%> to the <S%H1116>high<s%> place that was at <S%H1391>Gibeon;<s%> for <S%H8033>there<s%> was the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

But the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5927>brought<s%> up from <S%H7157>Kirjathjearim<s%> to the place which <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for it: for he had <S%H5186>pitched<s%> a <S%H168>tent<s%> for it at <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Moreover the <S%H5178>brazen<s%> <S%H4196>altar,<s%> that <S%H1212>Bezaleel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H221>Uri,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2354>Hur,<s%> had <S%H6213>made,<s%> he <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> and the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> <S%H1875>sought<s%> to it.

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up <S%H8033>thither<s%> to the <S%H5178>brazen<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> which was at the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> a <S%H7239>thousand<s%> <S%H505><s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offerings on it.
In that <S%H3915>night<s%> did <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>appear<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H7592>Ask<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> I shall <S%H5414>give<s%> you.

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> You have <S%H6213>showed<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H25>father,<s%> and have made me to <S%H4427>reign<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> let your <S%H1697>promise<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H25>father<s%> be <S%H539>established:<s%> for you have made me <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> a <S%H5971>people<s%> like the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> in <S%H7227>multitude.<s%>

<S%H5414>Give<s%> me <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4093>knowledge,<s%> that I may <S%H3318>go<s%> out and <S%H935>come<s%> in <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people:<s%> for <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> your <S%H5971>people,<s%> that is so <S%H1419>great?<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> was in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and you have not <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H6239>riches,<s%> <S%H5233>wealth,<s%> or <S%H3519>honor,<s%> nor the <S%H5315>life<s%> of your <S%H8130>enemies,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1571>yet<s%> have <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>life;<s%> but have <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4093>knowledge<s%> for yourself, that you may <S%H8199>judge<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H5921><s%> I have made you <S%H4427>king:<s%>

<S%H2451>Wisdom<s%> and <S%H4093>knowledge<s%> is <S%H5414>granted<s%> to you; and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H6239>riches,<s%> and <S%H5233>wealth,<s%> and <S%H3519>honor,<s%> <S%H834>such<s%> as <S%H3808>none<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> have <S%H1961>had<s%> that have been <S%H6440>before<s%> you, <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall there any <S%H310>after<s%> you <S%H1961>have<s%> the <S%H3651>like.<s%>

Then <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from his journey to the <S%H1116>high<s%> place that was at <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen:<s%> and he <S%H1961>had<s%> a <S%H7239>thousand<s%> <S%H505><s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H7239>thousand<s%> <S%H505><s%> <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> which he <S%H3240>placed<s%> in the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and with the <S%H4428>king<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>made<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> as plenteous as <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H730>cedar<s%> trees <S%H5414>made<s%> he as the <S%H8256>sycomore<s%> trees that are in the <S%H8219>vale<s%> for <S%H7230>abundance.<s%>

And <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H5483>horses<s%> <S%H4161>brought<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H4723>linen<s%> <S%H4723>yarn:<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H5503>merchants<s%> <S%H3947>received<s%> the <S%H4723>linen<s%> <S%H4723>yarn<s%> at a <S%H4242>price.<s%>

And they <S%H5927>fetched<s%> up, and <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> a <S%H4818>chariot<s%> for <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and an <S%H5483>horse<s%> for an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty:<s%> and so <S%H3318>brought<s%> they out <S%H5483>horses<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and for the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H758>Syria,<s%> by their <S%H3027>means.<s%>
